verses.name: Jeremiah 50:34
verses.text: Their Redeemer is strong; the Lord of hosts is his name: he shall throughly plead their cause, that he may give rest to the land, and disquiet the inhabitants of Babylon.

verses.name: Jeremiah 50:35
verses.text: A sword is upon the Chaldeans, saith the Lord, and upon the inhabitants of Babylon, and upon her princes, and upon her wise men.

verses.name: Jeremiah 50:36
verses.text: A sword is upon the liars; and they shall dote: a sword is upon her mighty men; and they shall be dismayed.
